title: RT France annonce sa "fermeture" apr√®s le gel de ses comptes bancaires
cleaned_sentences: Archives photo of a microphone with the RT France logo, in Paris (Reuters) - The media Russia Today France (RT France), controlled by the Russian State, announced on Saturday its "closure" after the freeze of its bank accounts.

"Under the cover of the 9th package of sanctions against Russia - which is not aimed at our channel, but our shareholder and parent company - The General Directorate of the Treasury has decided to freeze the bank accounts of RT France, making it impossible for the continuation of our activity," said RT France in a statement published on its website.
The members of the European Union (EU) agreed in December on a ninth train of sanctions against Russia because of its invasion of Ukraine.
